name: Jungle Drive
description:
This is an endless runner style game where you control a monster truck. Avoid obstacles and beat your high score! The game includes a unique suspension mechanic that is linked speed and the high score and in-depth customization.

Controls: left/ right - A/D, suspension - SPACE, pause- ESC/TAB. 

To maintain a high speed primarily have the suspension lowered, if heading towards water or mud, temporarily raise the suspension to maintain speed through the obstacle, if the suspension is raised too long the car will slow down from drag. Score can only be gained when travelling at maximum speed, speed is indicated at the bottom of the screen.

To view more information on this game, and see my other projects go to https://www.lueke.live/
